prompt: <description>**Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side.** Construct a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.4914, 0.0] Create a new 2D sketch on face 1. Draw the following lines and arcs to create a loop on the sketch: 1. Line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.1616, 0.0] 2. Line from point [0.1616, 0.0] to point [0.1616, 0.1616] 3. Line from point [0.1616, 0.1616] to point [0.0, 0.1616] 4. Line from point [0.0, 0.1616] to point [0.0, 0.0] Close the loop by connecting the last point to the first point. This will create a face in the 3D model. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.1616. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the defined coordinate system parameters. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.2328 towards the normal direction. **Part 2: Cylindrical object with a tapered end, resembling a metallic tube or pipe.** Construct a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [180.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.1131, 0.4914, 0.0485] Create a new 2D sketch on face 1. Draw a circle with its center at point [0.0323, 0.0323] and radius of 0.0323. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.0647. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the defined coordinate system parameters. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.2586 towards the normal direction, joining it with the previous part. **Part 3: Cylindrical object with a tapered top and bottom** Construct a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0485, 0.2586, 0.0485] Create a new 2D sketch on face 1. Draw a circle with its center at point [0.0323, 0.0323] and radius of 0.0323. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.0647. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the defined coordinate system parameters. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.2586 towards the normal direction, joining it with the previous part. **Part 4: Cylindrical object with a central hole, resembling a roll of paper or a tube.** Construct a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [180.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.1616, 0.75, 0.0] Create a new 2D sketch on face 1. Draw two circles with their center at point [0.0808, 0.0808] and radii of 0.0808 and 0.0356 for inner circle. Sketch_scale: 0.1616 Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.0808 in the opposite direction of the normals, creating a new solid body. This will form a cylindrical object with a central hole, resembling a roll of paper or a tube.</description>
